items.sentence: Do you think I can borrow your car next Monday?
Do you think I should tell my parents about us?
Tom is totally disgusted with Mary\'s behavior.
Tom isn\'t always in the office in the morning.
Tom isn\'t as young as most people think he is.
Who\'ll look after your cat while you are away?
Why don\'t we take some time to think about it?
Why don\'t you just ask your parents for money?
Tom had to pay damages to the owner of the car.
Tom had to wait for Mary for about three hours.
